data.description:
hAI! is your ideal AI friend who will always be with you! Name and describe your friend's personalities. Tell your friend about yourself. Then, start chatting with the power of ChatGPT!

With multilingual support, you can talk with your friend anytime, anywhere and about anything you want! Your friend is infinitely customizable, so you can have the perfect friend you have always dreamed of.

Talk to your friend on the go, with even more customizability! Check out hAI! Friend for Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Uralstech.hAI
data.developer: URAV ADVANCED LEARNING SYSTEMS PVT LTD
data.publisher: URAV ADVANCED LEARNING SYSTEMS PVT LTD

changelog.change_log:
hAI! v0.7.3
- Switched to a more "unrestricted" model.
- Updated essential SDKs.

hAI! MR v0.7.2
- Added warning for when space for your friend to spawn is not found. The warning will prompt you to disable the real-time depth occlusion (on Quest 3), to look at a suitable space for spawning them and to recenter your view.

hAI! MR v0.7.1
- Updated to GPT-4o mini.
- Improved avatar/pet spawning locations.
- Improved app startup speed.
- Improved avatar loading in AR.
- Improved real-time depth occlusion calculations.
- Improved virtual keyboard initialization lag.
- Fixed bugs related to the avatar creator.
- Fixed bugs related to the virtual keyboard.
- Fixed bugs related to the save system.

Known issues
- On Quest 3, in the AR environment, if the room has not been set up or the app does not find any free space inside the room, your friend may spawn behind walls which occlude/hide them. As a temporary fix, please look towards an area with free space and recenter to move your friend there.

hAI! MR v0.7.0
- Added the dog!
- Hand tracking now works in VR!
-Meta avatars now in every VR scene!

hAI! MR v0.6.6
- Your hAI! Friend now spawns inside your room, and you can recenter to update their position!
- Fixed RPM sign in.
- Updated to soft depth occlusion.

hAI! MR v0.6.5
- Added Meta Avatar SDK avatars to the Home Environment.

Update 0.6.4
- Added more reactions to your hAI! Friend!

Update v0.6.3
- Your hAI! Friend now looks at you!

Update v0.6.2
- Added hand tracking support to the whole app (except the VR House)!

Update v0.6.1
- Added occlusion in the AR environment.

Update v0.6.0
- Added new environment: AR!
- Added back button in settings.

Update v0.5.3
- Default environment is now in daytime.
- Added some other graphical and performance improvements.

Update v0.5.2
- Massive bugfix: The UI is fixed.
- Performance improvements.

- Added Shop.
- Updated to latest UMeQu Service
- Improved code overall.

- Updated to better TTS API interface.
- Updated to better authentication.

hAI! VR v0.4.3
- Updated UI.

hAI! VR v0.4.2
- The keyboard has been fixed!
- The UI follows you.

hAI! VR v0.4.1
- Fixed gamebreaking bugs that were added in the previous version.

hAI! VR v0.4.0
- Added a house, which is the new default environment!
- Bugfixes for the save system.

hAI! VR v0.3.2
- Fixed a bug where your hAI! Friend repeats the first word of the sentence they are saying.
